title: hcml启动失败！
txt_content:
如图
以下为错误
[14:11:40] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[14:11:41] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[14:11:41] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...

[14:11:47] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.1.5
  Time: 2019-11-23 14:11:47
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.ClassCastException: class jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader cannot be cast to class java.net.URLClassLoader (jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader and java.net.URLClassLoader are in module java.base of loader 'bootstrap')

-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64), 10.0
  Java Version: 13.0.1, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation

11月 23, 2019 2:11:47 下午 org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.CrashReporter lambda$reportToServer$10

严重: Failed to post HMCL server.

java.net.UnknownHostException: huangyuhui.duapp.com

replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-11-23 14:17
更新 hmcl
http://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HMCL/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/HMCL/build/libs/HMCL-3.2.13 ...
那我以前的数据怎么办

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
1521036689 发表于 2019-11-23 14:18
那我以前的数据怎么办
并不会影响，升级的仅是启动器而已

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 ItIsEnderman 于 2019-11-23 21:56 编辑 

额……单独从class version以及ClassLoader变动角度考虑的话，我还是建议先换Java8再说。

java.lang.ClassCastException: class jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader cannot be cast to class java.net.URLClassLoader (jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader and java.net.URLClassLoader are in module java.base of loader 'bootstrap')
还真是这个鬼强制类转换啊，换Java8。JDK一般情况下最好别乱拿去开Minecraft。
